title: mc1.7.10打开自制服务器崩溃
author: hihaar
txt_content:
话不多说
服务器配置：

#Minecraft server properties
#Mon Dec 03 18:37:02 CST 2018
generator-settings=
op-permission-level=4
allow-nether=true
level-name=world

spawn-animals=true

hardcore=false

difficulty=1
enable-command-block=false
player-idle-timeout=0
gamemode=0
max-players=20
spawn-monsters=true
view-distance=10
generate-structures=true
spawn-protection=16
motd=A Minecraft Server
